an3.10:1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male appahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.10:1.3: Dussīlo ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:1.4: issukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:1.5: maccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti.
an3.10:1.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male appahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.10:2.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male pahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an3.10:2.3: Sīlavā ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:2.4: anissukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:2.5: amaccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti.
an3.10:2.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male pahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
